abstract: The New York Comic Con, now in early October, feels like a dress rehearsal for Halloween. Here are some possibilities for Monday night.
snippet: The New York Comic Con, now in early October, feels like a dress rehearsal for Halloween. Here are some possibilities for Monday night.
lead_paragraph: The most dedicated Comic Con-goers have always shown their loyalties by attending the convention in costume, but now that the New York Comic Con has moved from February to October, part of the event feels like a dress rehearsal for Halloween.
